definition: to supervise the manufacture of/to supervise the shooting of films/executive producer (film)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: He is a go-between for producer and listener.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个界乎监制与听众之间的人。

sentences.english: Please support the TV stations, producers and artists.
sentences.chinese: 请支持各电视台，监制及艺人。

sentences.english: The production of the "Power of Attorney for Concurrent-Business Insurance Agency" shall be centrally supervised by the CIRC.
sentences.chinese: 《保险兼业代理委托书》由中国保监会统一监制。

sentences.english: Acclaimed director Osamu Dezaki will supervise the animators of the film's productions.
sentences.chinese: 著名导演出崎统将监制电影的制作过程。

sentences.english: He oversees animation at both Pixar and Disney.
sentences.chinese: 拉塞特同时兼任了皮克斯和迪斯尼的动画监制。

sentences.english: Party A shall provide to Party B the official invoice printed under the authorization of the relevant tax bureau in the PRC .
sentences.chinese: 甲方必须开具印有税务局监制章的正式发票。

sentences.english: The Methods stipulate that invoices should be chomatolographed with the manufacture-supervising seal for unified national invoices.
sentences.chinese: 办法》规定，发票应当套印全国统一发票监制章。

sentences.english: Became a full-time artiste after being discovered by a television executive producer in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 1999年被电视台监制发掘，后来成为全职艺人。

sentences.english: There seemed to be no reason to ask her to buy us a dinner during the middle of the production.
sentences.chinese: 因为没有理由要求监制在电影只完成一半便请食饭。

sentences.english: The silk fan by zhejiang museum collection and supervised.
sentences.chinese: 该真丝扇由浙江省博物馆监制并珍藏。

sentences.english: Officially licensed by the American Red Cross, so you can count on its quality.
sentences.chinese: 由美国红十字会监制，你可以信任的质量。

sentences.english: Provide serial jeanswear designs, and production supervision for branding companies.
sentences.chinese: 为品牌服装公司提供牛仔服装系列开发和生产监制。

sentences.english: The Methods stipulate that invoices should be chomatolographed with the manufacture-supervising seal for …
sentences.chinese: 《办法》规定，发票应当套印全国统一发票监制章。

sentences.english: Michelle Reis and Rosamund Kwan are also on hand to fight evil.
sentences.chinese: 监制徐克，李嘉欣和关之琳也并肩对抗邪恶。

definition: to produce an item/output/items that are produced
editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
(publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
